  • Constructor Details

    • Question

      public Question()
      Default constructor for the `Question` class. This constructor initializes the `Question` object without setting any of its attributes.

    • Question

      public Question(String question, String optionA, String optionB, String optionC, String optionD, String answer, String type, String score)
      Constructor to initialize a `Question` object with specific values for all attributes.
      Parameters:
      question - The question text.
      optionA - The first option for the question.
      optionB - The second option for the question.
      optionC - The third option for the question.
      optionD - The fourth option for the question.
      answer - The correct answer (A, B, C, or D).
      type - The type of question: "Single" or "Multiple".
      score - The score assigned to this question.

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
